meanings.definition: The state or quality of being tranquil.
meanings.sent1: The tranquilnesses of the forest brought a sense of peace to all who visited.
meanings.sent2: The tranquilnesses of the lake at dawn were truly breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The tranquilnesses of the library were suddenly disrupted by a loud sneeze.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a sea of tranquilnesses, undisturbed by the chaos around her.
meanings.sent5: The tranquilnesses of the mountain peak were like a soothing balm for the soul.

meanings.definition: The calmness or peacefulness of a place or situation.
meanings.sent1: The tranquilnesses of the meadow enveloped her in a sense of serenity.
meanings.sent2: The tranquilnesses of the garden were a welcome escape from the city noise.
meanings.sent3: The tranquilnesses of the classroom were shattered by the sudden ringing of the bell.
meanings.sent4: In the midst of chaos, she found solace in the tranquilnesses of her own mind.
meanings.sent5: The tranquilnesses of the beach at sunset painted a picture of pure tranquility.
